languages.text: Оглядываясь, слуга воровато сметает объедки с тарелок к себе в передник.
It does not escape your notice that a few leftovers from the plates disappear into the servant's filthy apron.
languages.original_text: Оглядываясь, слуга воровато сметает объедки с тарелок к себе в передник.

traits.locale_text: A servant looks around, then surreptitiously sweeps leftovers from the plates into his apron.
A servant looks around, then surreptitiously sweeps leftovers from the plates into his apron.
A servant glances around, then surreptitiously sweeps a few leftovers from the plates into his apron.
A servant glances around, then surreptitiously sweeps a few leftovers from the plates into his apron.
It does not escape your notice that a few leftovers from the plates disappear into the servant's filthy apron.
It does not escape your notice that a few leftovers from the plates disappear into the servant's filthy apron.

languages.text: 皿の上に残った食べ物のいくつかが、使用人の汚れたエプロンの中に消えていくのを、あなたは見逃さなかった。
languages.original_text: It does not escape your notice that a few leftovers from the plates disappear into the servant's filthy apron.

traits.locale_text: 皿の上に残った食べ物のいくつかが、使用人の汚れたエプロンの中に消えていくのを、あなたは見逃さなかった。

languages.text: Hizmetkârın, tabaklardan birkaç artığı pis önlüğüne koyduğunu fark ediyorsun.
languages.original_text: It does not escape your notice that a few leftovers from the plates disappear into the servant's filthy apron.

traits.locale_text: Hizmetkârın tabaklardan birkaç artığı pis önlüğüne koyduğunu fark ediyorsun.

languages.text: No puedes evitar fijarte que algunos restos de los platos acaban dentro del sucio delantal.
languages.original_text: It does not escape your notice that a few leftovers from the plates disappear into the servant's filthy apron.

traits.locale_text: No puedes evitar fijarte que algunos restos de los platos acaban dentro del sucio delantal.

languages.text: 你注意到，盘子里的一部分剩菜消失在了仆人肮脏的围裙里。
languages.original_text: It does not escape your notice that a few leftovers from the plates disappear into the servant's filthy apron.

traits.locale_text: 你注意到，盘子里的一部分剩菜消失在了仆人肮脏的围裙里。

languages.text: Vous remarquez qu'une partie des reliefs restés sur les assiettes disparaît dans les poches crasseuses des serviteurs.
languages.original_text: It does not escape your notice that a few leftovers from the plates disappear into the servant's filthy apron.

traits.locale_text: Vous remarquez qu'une partie des reliefs restés sur les assiettes disparaît dans les poches crasseuses des serviteurs.

languages.text: Es entgeht deiner Aufmerksamkeit nicht, dass einige Reste von den Tellern in der schmutzigen Schürze einer Dienern verschwinden.
languages.original_text: It does not escape your notice that a few leftovers from the plates disappear into the servant's filthy apron.

traits.locale_text: Es entgeht deiner Aufmerksamkeit nicht, dass einige Reste von den Tellern in der schmutzigen Schürze einer Dienern verschwinden.
